Title: Extends the authorization of residential property owners in high risk brush fire areas on Staten Island to cut and remove reeds
Summary: Extends, until December 31, 2026, the authorization of residential property owners in high risk brush fire areas on Staten Island to cut and remove reeds.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 306 of the laws of 2011 authorizing owners of residential real property in high risk brush fire areas in the borough of Staten Island to cut and remove reeds from their property, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
